en.name: Wine and Song
en.passiveDescription: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate Sprint by {{14%//16%//18%//20%//22%}} for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by {{20%//25%//30%//35%//40%}} for 5s.

zh.name: 暗巷的酒与诗
zh.passiveDescription: 普通攻击命中敌人后，冲刺或替代冲刺的能力消耗的体力降低{{14%//16%//18%//20%//22%}}，持续5秒。此外，使用冲刺或替代冲刺的能力后，攻击力提升{{20%//25%//30%//35%//40%}}，持续5秒。
